com.punchthrough.bean.sdk

Interface BeanListener


  • public interface BeanListener
    A Listener interface for communicating with the Bean.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onConnected()
      Called when the Bean is connected.
      void onConnectionFailed()
      Called when the connection could not be established.
      void onDisconnected()
      Called when the Bean has been disconnected.
      void onError(BeanError error)
      Called when an error occurs during sketch or firmware upload.
      void onReadRemoteRssi(int rssi)
      Called when a new RSSI value is received, in response to a previous call to Bean.readRemoteRssi().
      void onScratchValueChanged(ScratchBank bank, byte[] value)
      Called when one of the scratch characteristics of the Bean has updated its value.
      void onSerialMessageReceived(byte[] data)
      Called when a serial message is received from the Bean, e.g.

    • Method Detail

      • onConnected

        void onConnected()
        Called when the Bean is connected. Connected means that a Bluetooth GATT connection is made and the setup for the Bean serial protocol is complete.

      • onConnectionFailed

        void onConnectionFailed()
        Called when the connection could not be established. This could either be because the Bean could not be connected, or the serial connection could not be established.

      • onDisconnected

        void onDisconnected()
        Called when the Bean has been disconnected.

      • onSerialMessageReceived

        void onSerialMessageReceived(byte[] data)
        Called when a serial message is received from the Bean, e.g. a Serial.write() from Arduino code.
        Parameters:
        data - the data that was sent from th bean

      • onScratchValueChanged

        void onScratchValueChanged(ScratchBank bank,
                           byte[] value)
        Called when one of the scratch characteristics of the Bean has updated its value.
        Parameters:
        bank - the ScratchBank that was updated
        value - the bank's new value

      • onError

        void onError(BeanError error)
        Called when an error occurs during sketch or firmware upload.
        Parameters:
        error - The BeanError that occurred

      • onReadRemoteRssi

        void onReadRemoteRssi(int rssi)
        Called when a new RSSI value is received, in response to a previous call to Bean.readRemoteRssi().
        Parameters:
        rssi - The RSSI for a connected remote device.
